summary: In this conversation, the customer service agent provided the customer with advice on how to troubleshoot their phone issue. The agent suggested resetting the phone by pressing and holding the power button for 10 seconds and then re-installing any apps or updates that may be needed for optimal performance. The agent also advised the customer to back up any important data before resetting their phone. If after performing these steps the customer is still experiencing issues, they should reach out to Contoso Wireless again so they can investigate further.
